Articles.Content:
So I was traveling to the Mun and after docking, my parts wouldn't perform science!

My pods wouldn't do crew reports

My science tools (seismic scan, mystery goo, gravioli, etc) only have the option of turning on the displays

The Kerbonauts can't conduct EVA reports nor gather surface samples.

What do I do?

It's really hard to guess without more information. Please check out this thread for the kinds of information that would help: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92230-Stock-Support-Bug-Reporting-Guide

Also, are you using any mods?

Cheers,

~Claw

Guessing that you're somehow missing the ScienceDefs.cfg file.

EDIT: Though why it would only manifest after docking, I don't know. Sure it worked fine beforehand? And you didn't change anything else, it was literally can do science->dock->can't do science?

This sounds very clichÃƒÂ©, but

Have you tried undocking and docking again? Does science modules/crew reports work while not docked? Can you do Eva reports without problem?
